trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Murfreesboro
There were no other sightings in Murfreesboro on or around July 27th 1988
divs: Sighting DetailsMurfreesboro, TN. 10.26.07. 20:10. Front porch of my apartment, near MTSU campus. While star gazing, observed a red point of light moving North - South across the sky, too fast and too distant to be an aircraft. Observer first assumed object was an orbiting satellite. The object suddenly deviated from its trajectory, moving with great speed in a triangle formation, then briefly returning to the original trajectory before moving quickly from sight in no more than an instant.
Summary: Bright lightn moves steadily, deviates from trajectory, disappears
